Name: Tetris(俄罗斯方块收纳版)
About the game: This Tetris game is designed with 110+ modes to play. 55 modes for single player, 22 modes for two players cooperation, 33 modes for two players PVP and Winner is whom got 100 scores first. 110 background music picked up for your choice. Double click M key for a audition of music on start menu or replay music in game mode. You would have lots of options in this Tetris game. [The reason why game started without full_screen is that some anti-virus software such as 360 anti-virus software is optimizing game mode. If this happened occasionally, You just need to click stop game button and click start game button again to solve this problem temporarily. You could also shut down the game mode setting and aoto into game mode setting in the settings of 360 anti-virus software to solve this problem permanently.]
